c1.name: Radiance Over Blossoms and Peaks
c1.descriptionRaw:
Unleashing her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Eternal Tides</color> will immediately trigger an effect equivalent to the effect of {LINK#N11250001}<color=#FFD780FF>Gravity Interference</color>{/LINK}. This effect can be triggered once every 15s.
<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>
When Gravity Interference is triggered, if the Lunar reaction type that has accumulated the most Gravity for Columbina is:
· <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar-Charged</color>: Your current active character will recover 6 Energy.
· <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar-Bloom</color>: Your active character's interruption resistance will be increased for 8s.
· <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar-Crystallize</color>: Summons a <color=#FFD780FF>Rainsea Shield</color>. The Rainsea Shield's DMG absorption is based on 12% of Columbina's Max HP, and it will absorb <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> with 250% effectiveness for 8s.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is {LINK#N11190007}<color=#FFD780FF>elevated</color>{/LINK} by 1.5%.
c1.description:
Unleashing her Elemental Skill Eternal Tides will immediately trigger an effect equivalent to the effect of **Gravity Interference**. This effect can be triggered once every 15s.
Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam
When Gravity Interference is triggered, if the Lunar reaction type that has accumulated the most Gravity for Columbina is:
· Lunar-Charged: Your current active character will recover 6 Energy.
· Lunar-Bloom: Your active character's interruption resistance will be increased for 8s.
· Lunar-Crystallize: Summons a Rainsea Shield. The Rainsea Shield's DMG absorption is based on 12% of Columbina's Max HP, and it will absorb Hydro DMG with 250% effectiveness for 8s.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is **elevated** by 1.5%.

c2.name: Not in Lone Splendor
c2.descriptionRaw:
Rate of accumulating {LINK#N11250001}<color=#FFD780FF>Gravity</color>{/LINK} increases by 34%. 
When <color=#FFD780FF>Gravity Interference</color> is triggered, Columbina will receive the <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Brilliance</color> effect, which increases her Max HP by 40% for 8s.
<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>:
When <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Brilliance</color> is active, if, during the current trigger of <color=#FFD780FF>Gravity Interference</color>, the Lunar reaction type that has accumulated the most Gravity for Columbina is:
· <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar-Charged</color>: ATK of your current active character increases. Increase in ATK is equal to 1% of Columbina's Max HP.
· <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar-Bloom</color>: Elemental Mastery of your current active character increases. Increase in Elemental Mastery is equal to 0.35% of Columbina's Max HP.
· <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar-Crystallize</color>: DEF of your current active character increases. Increase in DEF is equal to 1% of Columbina's Max HP.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is {LINK#N11190007}<color=#FFD780FF>elevated</color>{/LINK} by 7%.
c2.description:
Rate of accumulating **Gravity** increases by 34%. 
When Gravity Interference is triggered, Columbina will receive the Lunar Brilliance effect, which increases her Max HP by 40% for 8s.
Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam:
When Lunar Brilliance is active, if, during the current trigger of Gravity Interference, the Lunar reaction type that has accumulated the most Gravity for Columbina is:
· Lunar-Charged: ATK of your current active character increases. Increase in ATK is equal to 1% of Columbina's Max HP.
· Lunar-Bloom: Elemental Mastery of your current active character increases. Increase in Elemental Mastery is equal to 0.35% of Columbina's Max HP.
· Lunar-Crystallize: DEF of your current active character increases. Increase in DEF is equal to 1% of Columbina's Max HP.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is **elevated** by 7%.

c3.name: Dreamlike Glow Across Tranquil Waters
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11252}Eternal Tides{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is {LINK#N11190007}<color=#FFD780FF>elevated</color>{/LINK} by 1.5%.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Elemental Skill **Eternal Tides** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is **elevated** by 1.5%.

c4.name: Cloudveiled Ridges in Floral Mists

c5.name: Silence Tending One Lone Song
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11255}Moonlit Melancholy{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is {LINK#N11190007}<color=#FFD780FF>elevated</color>{/LINK} by 1.5%.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Elemental Burst **Moonlit Melancholy** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is **elevated** by 1.5%.

c6.name: Through Darkness Led by Moonlight
c6.descriptionRaw:
For 8s after characters in the {LINK#N11250002}<color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Domain</color>{/LINK} trigger a Lunar reaction, based on the elements involved in the reaction, the CRIT DMG of the corresponding Elemental DMG done by all party members is increased by 80%. The CRIT DMG-increasing effects for the same Elemental Type do not stack.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is {LINK#N11190007}<color=#FFD780FF>elevated</color>{/LINK} by 7%.
c6.description:
For 8s after characters in the **Lunar Domain** trigger a Lunar reaction, based on the elements involved in the reaction, the CRIT DMG of the corresponding Elemental DMG done by all party members is increased by 80%. The CRIT DMG-increasing effects for the same Elemental Type do not stack.

All nearby party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is **elevated** by 7%.
